subject: Re: [junit] HTML testing
msgSnippet: Andi, HTMLUnit has been mentioned here, but I don t know much about it, nor about your requirements.  Good luck, David Saff
messageBody:
Andi,

HTMLUnit has been mentioned here, but I don't know much about it, nor
about your requirements. Good luck,

David Saff

> Hi guys,

>
> Best Regards,
>
> Andi
